PickTicketAssignment.name: PickTicketAssignment
PickTicketAssignment.description: Represents the association of a FulfillmentOrder with a PickTicket. A PickTicket has one PickTicketAssignment for each FulfillmentOrder containing products to be picked as part of that PickTicket.

AttachedToId.description: ID of the FulfillmentOrder to associate with a PickTicket.

PickTicketId.description: ID of the PickTicket to associate with a FulfillmentOrder.
